member.summary: Defines a contract that must be implemented by an extension responsible for capturing and logging trace events via a remote logging service.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Experience.CloudFx.Extensions.Diagnostics.RemoteLoggingClientExtension.#ctor(Microsoft.Experience.CloudFx.Framework.Configuration.ServiceBusEndpointInfo,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a object using the specified Service Bus relay endpoint that will be used for communication with the remote logging service. The specified defines a binary mask with the type of events that will be subject to remote logging. This parameter might be useful when sending only specific types of events events to the remote service. In order to submit specific events to the remote logging service, use the desired combination of the enumeration members converted to and combined using the logical OR ("|") operation.
member.param: The Service Bus relay endpoint which will be used to connect to the remote logging service.
The binary mask combining one or more values specifying the type of event that will be sent to the remote service.
The optional parameter defining the maximum size of the buffer accumulating trace events before they are sent to the remote service.

The optional parameter defining the maximum time length of the buffering window during which trace events are accumulated before delivery to the remote service. If omitted, the default window of 10 seconds will be used.
